
Key Concepts of Prayer Free Will & God's Sovereignty

- **Sovereignty & Prayer:** We pray _because_ God is sovereign, meaning He controls all things and can order events according to His purpose, making our prayers meaningful.

- **God's Will & Our Will:** God's will isn't just duty; He makes believers increasingly _willing_ to do it. We are to pray for His will to be done, trusting His perfect plan.

- **[Human Free Will](https://www.google.com/search?q=Human+Free+Will&sca_esv=202def80b516af86&sxsrf=AE3TifMfFo-oZ2HlcnY7zB6FYfxFSDHa0A%3A1767190402349&ei=gi9VafSQFcyOur8P-cKTgAY&ved=2ahUKEwjE6brxgeiRAxUiBu8CHfKcLuwQgK4QegQIAxAD&uact=5&oq=ligonier+ministries+prayer%2C+free+will+and+god%27s+sovereignty&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfDqHObzOGz_n-43HRfcaViuks97RdnHDtbH5cIZ7qWASmhG_GCJEuIWJvAKp3Dh3UXpUJ-yFNP29oY6DTglkt8KeJKBmlP7hIkYGGdgTOIsntc2N5tzhOSnOb37qZYGfGIrrZdixEp1grkKLPUu4vvmLQKvkiZjihHnXb5iCD-EY-SgymuzcphpuU0vsKVpYNQhJO9qYzgUy0mfee4R3-lCA2SPMLQboRhvBENRe7tMrL3_LECCo6ZkWUdKe9J6kVSkVVHZQwad-fcRxVtU2uC7pVLuFapWhvhKyDlGLPy-xA&csui=3):** Ligonier aligns with Reformed theology: humans have "free will" to choose what they desire (e.g., a favorite sin), but apart from God's grace, their desires are corrupted, leading them to freely choose sin. True freedom to choose God comes through spiritual regeneration.

- **[Concurrence](https://www.google.com/search?q=Concurrence&sca_esv=202def80b516af86&sxsrf=AE3TifMfFo-oZ2HlcnY7zB6FYfxFSDHa0A%3A1767190402349&ei=gi9VafSQFcyOur8P-cKTgAY&ved=2ahUKEwjE6brxgeiRAxUiBu8CHfKcLuwQgK4QegQIAxAF&uact=5&oq=ligonier+ministries+prayer%2C+free+will+and+god%27s+sovereignty&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp&mstk=AUtExfDqHObzOGz_n-43HRfcaViuks97RdnHDtbH5cIZ7qWASmhG_GCJEuIWJvAKp3Dh3UXpUJ-yFNP29oY6DTglkt8KeJKBmlP7hIkYGGdgTOIsntc2N5tzhOSnOb37qZYGfGIrrZdixEp1grkKLPUu4vvmLQKvkiZjihHnXb5iCD-EY-SgymuzcphpuU0vsKVpYNQhJO9qYzgUy0mfee4R3-lCA2SPMLQboRhvBENRe7tMrL3_LECCo6ZkWUdKe9J6kVSkVVHZQwad-fcRxVtU2uC7pVLuFapWhvhKyDlGLPy-xA&csui=3):** God's sovereignty and human action work together. He ordains events, using human choices (even evil ones) as secondary causes to achieve His ultimate purposes, as seen in Job's story.

- **Prayer as Command & Tool:** Praying is an act of obedience to God's commands, and He uses our prayers as an effective means to accomplish His decreed purposes.
